body:
Since #16132, we've consolidated the setting of FORCE_UNSAFE_CONFIGURE to `autotools.py`, so we don't need to use it in packages like `coreutils`, in our commands, or in our container recipes.

- [x] Remove FORCE_UNSAFE_CONFIGURE from packages
- [x] Remove FORCE_UNSAFE_CONFIGURE from container recipes
- [x] Remove FORCE_UNSAFE_CONFIGURE from `spack ci` command

@DiegoMagdaleno FYI.
title: autotools: remove FORCE_UNSAFE_CONFIGURE from docs, commands, code
